data.subject: ComfyUI_ImageProcessing
data.question: What is ComfyUI_ImageProcessing?
data.answer: ComfyUI_ImageProcessing is a set of custom nodes designed to apply various image processing techniques.

data.subject: ComfyUI_ImageProcessing
data.question: What library does ComfyUI_ImageProcessing utilize?
data.answer: ComfyUI_ImageProcessing uses the Kornia library for its functionality.

data.subject: Kornia (in the context of ComfyUI_ImageProcessing)
data.question: Where can I find more information about Kornia?
data.answer: More information about Kornia can be found at https://kornia.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html.
